answers.answer: I did around 25 weeks. I had hemmeroids. My doctor told me to take fiber pills and it helped a lot. I only took them once a day for about a week and it was completely gone. I've had to change my diet because of pre-diabetes (basically no sugar) but since I have I haven't had to take the pills.
Thanks I have been bleeding every time I go to the rest room

question: Does anybody else have blood in their stool?
title: bloody stool
